mimlclassifier

Class MIMLBinaryRelevance

  • java.lang.Object
    • mimlclassifier.MIMLClassifier
      • mimlclassifier.MIMLBinaryRelevance
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, mulan.classifier.MultiLabelLearner

    public class MIMLBinaryRelevance
extends MIMLClassifier
    Class implementing the BR algorithm for MIML data. A classifier is built for each label and predictions are also gathered for each label.
    Version:
    20170507
    Author:
    Ana I. Reyes Melero, Eva Gibaja, Amelia Zafra
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • buildInternal

        public void buildInternal(MIMLInstances dataSet)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from class: MIMLClassifier
        Learner specific implementation of building the model from MultiLabelInstances training data set. This method is called from MIMLClassifier.build(MultiLabelInstances) method, where behavior common across all learners is applied.
        Parameters:
        dataSet - the training data set.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if learner model was not created successfully.
